line_1: But stick the Needle on my Sleeve:
line_2: O'er stubborn Flax no more I grieve,

line_1: Pull'd half a dozen by the sleeve,
Who pin their easy faith on critic's sleeve,
Who pin their easy faith on critic's sleeve,
line_2: And, knowing nothing, ev'ry thing believe!

line_1: What though ye pull the careless sleeve,
line_2: And would tempt us to believe

line_1: Where, safe and laughing in his sleeve,
Says Mrs. Noworthy, and laught in her sleeve.
line_2: What ideas can such low-bred creatures conceive,
